name: Wild Rice Steak Skillet
directions: Grease lightly with oil and sear the meat 3-5 minutes on each side
Remove meat from the pan and set aside
Add onions and peppers, saut√© till limp
Deglaze pan with red wine (Add wine to the pan and scrape up browned bits)
Add rest of ingredients, bring to boil
Return meat to pan. Cover and simmer on medium 45 minutes or till most of liquid evaporates
